item.title: Cars clustering using dimension reduction methods - PCA and LDA
item.description: #install.packages("remotes") #remotes::install_github("vqv/ggbiplot", force = TRUE) library(ggplot2) library(ggbiplot) #remotes::install_github("kassambara/factoextra") library(factoextra) library(tidyverse) library(ggbiplot) library(reshape2) library(MASS) library(rsample) library(dplyr) library(stats) QUESTION 1: PRINCIPAL COMPONENT ANALYSIS You are going to analyse a D = 11 data set called ‘mtcars’ which comes with R distribution.

item.title: Interest rate analysis in R using logistic models
item.description: Introduction Welcome to the second workshop. We will continue working with the lending club data. In this workshop we will take the perspective of an investor to the lending club.

item.title: Predicting interest rates using K-fold CV,LASSO & OLS regression
item.description: In this piece I will analyse the data on interest rates in the Lendign Club. First I will conduct the ICE of the data together with visualisation of the variables disributions and correlations for better understanding.

item.title: Predicting Prices for Munich Airbnb
item.description: Airbnb is a prime example of a disruptive innovation, that is now one of the largest marketplaces for accomodation with over 7 million properties in more than 220 countries.

item.title: Gapminder Data Analisys - Data & Correlation Analysis
item.description: Gapminder data The Gapminder data is know worldwide thanks to Hans Rosling and his webstie data in Gapminder World. The data downloaded from the website was cut into the data frame that contains just six columns from the larger .

item.title: Gender Pay Discrimination - Statistical Hypothesis Testing
item.description: Omega Group plc- Pay Discrimination At the last board meeting of Omega Group Plc., the headquarters of a large multinational company, the issue was raised that women were being discriminated in the company, in the sense that the salaries were not the same for male and female executives.
